rotate:
Rotate your phone until Kaaba is in
the center
about1: Welcome to the JazakAllah App! Our app is designed to help you keep track of your prayer time, tasbih, zikr, and dua recitations. We have also some important features like qibla compass, mosque location, jakat calculator, islamic name generator by AI, AI islamic chat, macca live and many more. We understand the importance of maintaining a consistent and accurate count, and our app is here to make that process easier and more efficient for you.
about2: Our team consists of dedicated developers who are committed to providing you with a high-quality user experience. We value your feedback and suggestions, as they help us to continuously improve and enhance the app's features and functionality.
about3: Whether you're a seasoned reciter or just starting out, the JazakAllah App is here to support you on your spiritual journey. We hope our app becomes a useful tool for you in your daily worship routine.
privacy_intro: At Tasbih Counter, we prioritize the protection of your personal information. Here's how we collect, utilize, and safeguard your data:
provide_access: Provide you with access to our app and features
personalize_exp:
Personalize your experience and provide targeted 
advertising
communicate:
Communicate with you about our app and other 
products/services
improve: Improve our app and its features
we_dont_sell: We don't sell or rent your personal information
we_may_share:
We may share your info with third-party service 
providers
we_may_share2:
We may share your info when required by law or to 
protect our rights or the rights of others
reasonable:
We take reasonable measures to protect your personal 
information
we_may_update:
We may update this policy and will notify you of any 
material changes
question:
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact
us at privacy@tasbihcounter.com

Elevate your zikr with our app

Find Inner Peace
with Every Count

onboarding_text6:

on your spiritual journey

successfully_password_reset_msg: Your new password has been created successfully
monthly_desc: A support toward our labor and ad-free experience.
donation_desc: This is one time support for our team efforts.
donar_msg: Donor program is associated with subscription plan to make the app Ad-Free and continued on development. Monthly subscriptions renews every month. 14 days trial period after subscription.
yearly_des: A support toward our labor and continuous improvement.
donation_heading: Donating helps us develop, deploy and sustain the application. You won't get any extra features as the app is completely free
